co2-calculation: estimation from fig. 4.3 mackerel catch, process, transport = 1.1 kg CO2eq/kg + storage and distribution to Switzerland 0.8 kg CO2eq/kg = 1.9 CO2eq/kg. Canned with oil + 3.5 kg CO2eq/kg. Plastic + 0.05 kg CO2e/kg
other-references: 1. Blonk et al. 2008 Milieueffecten van Nederlandse consumptie van eiwitrijke producten. Blonk Milieu Advies in opdracht van VROM -> page 24, table 3.3 =  0.9 kg CO2/kg, not sure if the CO2-end value is on filet or on the complete fish.
references: 1. Buchspiess et al., 2011. Life Cycle Assessment of high sea fish vs salmon aquaculture - vielestudien. ESU Services. Page 12 text and fig. 4.3
calculation-process-documentation:
fishery till retail, without packaging and oil, including 

pelagic fishery industry, Denmark, fish to fillet factor 0.53
name: Makrele
